Description_lang: The caster summons a specter to haunt their enemies. This specter will inflict $227415s1 Shadow damage to all players every 2 sec. until it is dispelled. Dispelling the wrong player will result in all players taking $227419s1 Shadow damage instead.
AuraDescription_lang: $227415s1 Shadow damage every 2 sec.Cleanse the player with the specter to cancel this effect.Cleansing a player without the specter will result in $227419s1 Shadow damage to all players instead.
